name: A defiled human skin
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom like a god.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
It imparts dark memories to its wearer.
